descriptions: Student is unable to identify any of the book components (front cover, back cover, title page).
Student can identify only one of the book components correctly.
Student can correctly identify two of the book components, but struggles with the third.
Student identifies all three book components but provides a somewhat unclear or hesitant explanation.
Student confidently and correctly identifies all three book components (front cover, back cover, and title page).
Student confidently and correctly identifies all three book components and explains the purpose of each component in the book's presentation and information.
